tool_description: Processes and verifies borrower income information from various sources including pay stubs, tax returns, and bank statements to determine accurate income levels.

income_documents.description: List of income document types provided

employment_type.description: Type of employment: W2, 1099, self-employed, retired, unemployed

verification_method.description: Verification approach: full_doc, alt_doc, or stated_income

error_messages: Invalid employment type: Use one of [W2, 1099, self-employed, retired, unemployed].
Insufficient documentation: Provided documents are insufficient for the specified verification method.
Income variance too high: Stated income differs significantly from documented income (>25% variance).
Invalid tax year: Tax year must be between 2020 and 2024.
Document authenticity failed: Income documents appear to be altered or fraudulent.
usage: Provide income_documents, stated_monthly_income, and employment_type, optionally specify verification_method and tax_year. Returns verified income data and confidence metrics.

income_stability.description: Income stability assessment: stable, declining, increasing, volatile

income_variance_pct.description: Percentage variance between stated and verified income
